short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Enroll new patients, track time spent on existing patients, and download existing patient careplans.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Allow Cosan Group approved EMR websites to enroll new patients into Pathways, track time spent on their existing patients in Pathways, and allow them to download their patients careplans from Pathways.
